entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 8:53 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
